New Records: Janith Liyanage made his maiden ODI century
Key Match Events: Tanzid Hasan and Rishad Hossain blazed quick runs to help Bangladesh overcome some mid-innings chaos
Rishad took 40 runs off Wanindu Hasranga, from just 11 deliveries
Taskin Ahmed took three wickets to restrict Sri Lanka to 235
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzid Hasan came on as a concussion substitute and struck a crucial 84
Rishad Hossain blazed quick runs to help Bangladesh overcome some mid-innings chaos
Miscellaneous Highlights: Six players from Bangladesh got injured during the match
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed took Richard Kettleborough's place after the latter fell sick due to the heat
